Content:
Reload your Hand Crossbow with the inserted crossbow bolt.
Requires crossbow bolts in the rune slot.

Fire a decisive shot at a target with your Hand Crossbow, dealing [1].
Deals double damage from stealth.

Shoot your Hand Crossbow at a target, dealing [1](or [2]) and consuming a charge.
Damage scales with your equipped weapon. If no weapon is equipped, the second damage value is used.

Shoot your Hand Crossbow at a target, dealing [1] and consuming a charge.
Applies equipped weapon properties on hit.
